Headline: Updated: No 95th-bound Red Line Trains Between 69th and 95th
ShortDescription: Red Line service partially resumed, 95th-bound Red Line service remains suspended between 69th & 95th, Howard-bound Red Line service has resumed.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Red Line has partially resumed for Howard-bound service, but remains suspended for 95th-bound trains between the 69th and 95th due to a fire near the tracks.

As a result, trains are operating as follows:

  • Howard-bound trains are running normal between 95th and Howard, and,
  • 95th-bound trains are operating between Howard and 69th, only.  


Shuttle buses are available between 69th and 95th to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as the #29 State bus, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Purple Express Line delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Purple Express Line trains have resumed service to the Loop, trains are running w/residual delays. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Purple Express Line trains have resumed service to the Loop, trains are running with residual delays.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
